panel.title: GCP Instances Created / updated with External IP address

search.query: |tstats count where `gcp_index` sourcetype="google:gcp:pubsub:message" data.resource.labels.project_id=$project_id_tok$ "data.protoPayload.authorizationInfo{}.permission"="compute.subnetworks.useExternalIp" by attributes.timestamp, "data.protoPayload.resourceName", "data.protoPayload.authenticationInfo.principalEmail" | rename attributes.timestamp as Time, "data.protoPayload.resourceName" as "Resource Name", "data.protoPayload.authenticationInfo.principalEmail" as "Principal email" | table Time, "Resource Name", "Principal email"

panel.title: GCP Instances with access/activity on port 22
